techniques.comment: Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) execution â€” Severity: Medium â€” Covered via process/command-line patterns.
Command and Scripting Interpreter: PowerShell â€” Severity: High â€” Covers suspicious flags/args and LOLBIN handoffs.
Scheduled Task/Job: Scheduled Task â€” Severity: Medium â€” Creation/invocation patterns monitored.
Ingress Tool Transfer â€” Severity: High â€” Download/transfer behaviors via native tools covered.
OS Credential Dumping: Security Account Manager (SAM) â€” Severity: Critical â€” Access/dumping patterns covered.
OS Credential Dumping: LSA Secrets â€” Severity: Critical â€” Sensitive registry/LSA access behaviors covered.
Encrypted Channel â€” Severity: Medium â€” Indicators of encrypted/obfuscated C2 channel usage monitored.
Process Injection: Dynamic-link Library Injection â€” Severity: High â€” Sysmon EID 7/8 (image load/remote thread) logic implemented.
Signed Binary Proxy Execution: Mshta â€” Severity: Medium â€” HTA/URL/parent-child patterns covered.
Signed Binary Proxy Execution: Regsvr32 â€” Severity: Medium â€” .sct/scrobj and suspicious /i usage covered.
Signed Binary Proxy Execution: Rundll32 â€” Severity: Medium â€” pcwutl.dll, url.dll handlers, Control_RunDLL, screensaver abuse covered.
